title: Ukraine disputes Russia's claim will not storm Mariupol steel plant full of civilians - Fox News
content:
1. Ukraine disputes Russia's claim will not storm Mariupol steel plant full of civilians  Fox News
  2. Chechen unit fighting with Russia stands before a burning building and claims it has "cleansed and destroyed" Mariupol.  Yahoo News
  3. What Happened on Day 57 of the War in Ukraine  The New York Times
  4. Opinion | Putin has one last cruelty in mind for a devastated Mariupol  The Washington Post
  5. A Ukrainian woman who escaped Russia's assault on Mariupol says troops were targeting apartment buildings 'as if they were playing a computer game'  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Ukrainian officials on Friday countered claims by Russian President Vladimir Putin that he will not order a ground offensive on the Mariupol steel plant where thousands of Ukrainian civilians and soldiers remain holed up.
